title: Materialize Clusters as Filters for use in restricting future results
description: Given a set of clusters (either based on search result or document clustering), seed the filter cache with the cluster results as filters so that future searches could be directed to search only a given cluster.  Not sure yet how this would fit into the existing filter capabilities.
